status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Improve MusicPlayer API in the next SDK releases. For instance: If I set a queue of items at music player, I can't play "THAT" song... I forced to set a new queue...etc... Moreover I need a more powerful tools to save items metadata (playlist) and retrive the song in future... The query method with only title, album ecc.. sometime give me back the wrong song! :/
Please Appcelerator developers!!!
